title:

attachments.displayName:
STYLED by Atip W

www.oki-ni.com/styled/styled-by-atip-w-aw13

Atip W imagines life like a motorway; not cold, grey and long but a gateway to adventure, mobility and freedom. This is a world where change is not just constant but rapid. In such a fast-paced environment clothing must be equally adaptable. With over a decades experience in both the UK and New Zealand, Atip is defined by his keen eye for detail matched by his admiration for stark contrasts and extreme textures. To shoot his STYLED, Atip turn to Australian photographer Lindsay Armstrong.

CREDITS: Styling: Atip W, Photography: Lindsay Armstrong, Grooming: Diana Moar using Dermalogica and Kevin Murphy
Digital Operator: Lee Whittaker, Photo Assist: Liberto Fillo
